D

dealCardsFromDrawDeckToPlayer() - Method in class controller.GameController
First, dealCardsFromDrawDeckToPlayer shuffles the cards in this.drawDeck, then it gives each player 2 cards from this.drawDeck, add them to players' offer, finally it deletes the cards from this.drawDeck.
dealCardsFromDrawDeckToTrophie() - Method in class controller.GameController
First, dealCardsFromDrawDeckToTrophie() shuffles the cards in this.stack, then it gives out 2 ore 3 cards as the trophies, by adding them to this.trophies, then delete the cards from this.drawDeck
dealCardsFromStackToPlayer() - Method in class controller.GameController
First, dealCardsFromStackToPlayer shuffles the cards in the this.stack, then it gives each player 2 cards from this.stack, add them to players' offer, finally it deletes the cards from this.stack by using poll.
DEFAULT_SLEEPTIME - Variable in class Vue.VuePlayer
 
deleteCardDD() - Method in class moteur.DrawDeck
Delete a card into the collection cards, by using the methode java.util.LinkedList.poll().
deleteCardOffer(int) - Method in class moteur.Offer
This methode can delete certain card, by indicating the index(parm).
deleteObserver(Observer) - Method in class moteur.Observable
Deletes an observer from the set of observers of this object.
deleteObservers() - Method in class moteur.Observable
Clears the observer list so that this object no longer has any observers.
displayCard(CardsAJouer) - Method in class Vue.VuePlayer
This function will responsible for checking which card to be showed.
displayTrophies(JLabel, JLabel, int) - Method in class Vue.mainFrame
This function is responsible for displaying the Trophies of the game.
DrawDeck - Class in moteur
The draw deck.
DrawDeck() - Constructor for class moteur.DrawDeck
Constructor, it will automatically initialize the collection cards and set the indicator numCardDD to zero.
